properties.name: Display CSS

selectors.text: Entire page on which the media is being displayed.
Element containing the contents of the text or media.

properties.name: Get Online JW Library Lyrics Page URL

arguments.name: songNumber
arguments.text: The number of the song in the song book.

arguments.name: rsconf
arguments.text: A code found in the URL which is the letter "r" followed by an integer. (eg. "r5" which comes from the Portuguese URL at https://wol.jw.org/pt/wol/h/r5/lp-t)

arguments.name: lib
arguments.text: A code found in the URL which starts off with "lp-" followed by one or more leters representing the language. (eg. "lp-t" which comes from the Portuguese URL at https://wol.jw.org/pt/wol/h/r5/lp-t)

arguments.name: pubCode
arguments.text: A code representing the publication in the base language as found on the online JW Library.

return.text: The Online JW Library URL for the song.

properties.name: Parse Online JW Library Languages Page

arguments.name: html
arguments.text: HTML of the languages page found on the online JW Library.

arguments.name: rsconf
arguments.text: A code found in the URL which is the letter "r" followed by an integer. (eg. "r5" which comes from the Portuguese URL at https://wol.jw.org/pt/wol/h/r5/lp-t)

arguments.name: lib
arguments.text: A code found in the URL which starts off with "lp-" followed by one or more leters representing the language. (eg. "lp-t" which comes from the Portuguese URL at https://wol.jw.org/pt/wol/h/r5/lp-t)

return.type: Array<{rsconf: string, lib: string, name: string, lang: string}>
return.text: Array of objects representing all of the languages found on the languages page that you would like to make available for the user to choose from.

properties.name: Parse Online JW Library Lyrics Page

arguments.name: html
arguments.text: HTML of the lyrics page found on the online JW Library.

return.text: An object representing the song.  The `heading` property will be something like "Song 1".  The `title` property refers to the title of the song.  The `theme` property refers to the theme text(s).  The `stanzas` property will be an array of arrays of all of the lines in the song.

properties.name: Song Randomizer

arguments.name: songs
arguments.text: Array of all of the songs.  Each value in the array will be an object that contains the following properties:  title, duration, path.

arguments.name: lastSongIndex
arguments.text: Index into `songs` indicating the the last song that was played.  This will be `undefined` if a song has not been played since the application was opened.

return.text: The selected song object to play.

arguments.name: path
arguments.text: Absolute path to the song file.

arguments.name: title
arguments.text: Title as found in the metadata or in the file name.

return.text: Name of the song as it will appear in the song list.

texts.text:
Confía en Jehová
y haz el bien
————  (Salmo 37:3)  ————
texts.name: 2017 Year Text
Questions At The End
texts.text:
¿QUÉ APRENDEMOS DE LOS ERRORES DE LOS SIGUIENTES REYES?

  • Asá y Jehosafat

  • Ezequías

  • Josías
